K06n2882u_001:17: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma |
K06n2882u_001:18: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ mahatā ca bodhisattvagaṇena |
K06n2882u_001:32: rūpaṃ subhūte abhā vo nābhāvaḥ sadbhāvaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:33: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ subhūte abhāvo nābhāvaḥ sadbhāvaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:34: cakṣū rūpāṇi ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotraṃ śabdāḥ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇaṃ gandhā ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvā rasā jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyaḥ spraṣṭavyāni kāyavi jñānaṃ mano dharmāḥ manovijñānaṃ subhūte abhāvo nābhāvaḥ sadbhāvaḥ ||
K06n2882u_001:41: evaṃ tad rūpaṃ triparivartena bālapṛthagjanā yathābhūtam aprajānantas tad rūpam abhiniviśante'bhinirvartayanty
K06n2882u_001:65: uta narakeṣu tiryakṣu preteṣu deveṣu manuṣyeṣu ||
K06n2882u_001:72: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ subhūte abhāvo nābhāvaḥ sadbhāvaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:81: jihvā rasā jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyaḥ spraṣṭavyāni kāyavijñānaṃ
K06n2882u_001:85: mano dharmāḥ manovijñānaṃ subhūte abhāvo nābhāvaḥ sadbhāvaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:86: evaṃ tan manovijñānaṃ triparivartena bālapṛthagjanā yathābhūtam aprajānantas tan manovijñānam abhiniviśante'bhinirvartayanty avacchādayanti
K06n2882u_001:97: srāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā tāvan na niryāsyanti |
K06n2882u_001:117: yad uta narakeṣu tiryakṣu preteṣu deveṣu
K06n2882u_001:128: evaṃ ca tad rūpaṃ triparivartena paṇḍitā yathābhūtaṃ prajānanto nābhiniviśante nābhinirvartayanti prakāśayanti |
K06n2882u_001:139: evaṃ cānabhiniviśanto'nabhinirvartayantaḥ prakāśayanto jarāmaraṇaṃ na pratyanubhavanti |
K06n2882u_001:140: yad uta narakeṣu tiryakṣu preteṣu deveṣu manuṣyeṣu ||
K06n2882u_001:147: evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ ca triparivartena
K06n2882u_001:157: kaḥ punar vādaḥ śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā |
K06n2882u_001:172: yad uta narakeṣu tiryakṣu preteṣu deveṣu manuṣyeṣu ||
K06n2882u_001:179: rūpaṃ subhūte utpadyate ca vyayate ca |
K06n2882u_001:190: prajānato bodhisattvasya yo rūpasyānutpādaḥ sa saṃpadyate ||
K06n2882u_001:197: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ subhūte utpadyate ca vyayate ca |
K06n2882u_001:200: tāṃ punar anutpādaprakṛtiṃ vijñānasya yathābhūtaṃ prajānato bodhisattvasya yo vijñānasyānutpādaḥ sa saṃpadyate ||
K06n2882u_001:207: 1 yaḥ kaścit subhūte evaṃ vaded rūpam ātmā vātmīyaṃ veti tam ahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ vadāmi ||
K06n2882u_001:214: yaḥ kaścit subhūte evaṃ vaded vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam ātmā vātmīyaṃ veti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjana- (4)
K06n2882u_001:234: 2 yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaded rūpaṃ pūrvakṛtahetukaṃ veśvaranirmāṇahetukaṃ vāhetupratyayaṃ vā tam apy ahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ vadāmi ||
K06n2882u_001:241: yaḥ kaścit subhū te evaṃ vaded vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā
K06n2882u_001:245: vijñānaṃ pūrvakṛtahetukaṃ veśvaranirmāṇahetukaṃ vāhetupratyayaṃ vā tam apy ahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ vadāmi ||
K06n2882u_001:252: 3 yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaded rūpaṇālakṣaṇaṃ rūpam anubhavalakṣaṇā vedanā saṃjānanālakṣaṇā saṃjñā abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇāḥ saṃskārā vijā nanālakṣaṇaṃ
K06n2882u_001:256: tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ
K06n2882u_001:267: 4 yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaded rūpaṃ duḥkham apraśāntaṃ rūpanirodhaḥ sukhaṃ śāntam iti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ (5)
K06n2882u_001:287: yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaded vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ
K06n2882u_001:291: duḥkham apraśāntaṃ vijñānanirodhaḥ sukhaṃ śāntam iti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ vadāmi ||
K06n2882u_001:298: 5 yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaden nāsty eva rūpam iti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ
K06n2882u_001:309: yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaden nāsty eva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā
K06n2882u_001:313: vijñānam iti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ vadāmi ||
K06n2882u_001:320: 6 yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaded yā rūpasya niḥsvabhāvatā bhagavatā deśitānutpādo'nirodha ādiśāntatā prakṛtiparinirvṛtatā sarvā sā deśanā nirabhisaṃdhikā nirabhiprāyā (6)
K06n2882u_001:333: yathārutam eva jñeyeti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ vadāmi ||
K06n2882u_001:340: yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaded yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya niḥsvabhāvatā bhagavatā deśitānutpādo'nirodha ādiśāntatā prakṛtiparinirvṛtatā sarvā sā deśanā nirabhisaṃdhikā nirabhiprāyā yathārutam eva jñeyeti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ
K06n2882u_001:351: asti subhūte rūpaṃ yad rūpasyānabhiniveśāyānutpādāyānabhi- saṃkhyānāya saṃvartate |
K06n2882u_001:352: asti tad rūpaṃ yad rūpasya saṃkleśāya
K06n2882u_001:368: asti subhūte vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad vijñanasyānabhiniveśāyānutpādāyānabhisaṃkhyānāya saṃvartate |
K06n2882u_001:369: asti subhūte vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad
K06n2882u_001:374: asti vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad vijñānasya vyavadānāya vittatvāya saṃvartate || (7)
K06n2882u_001:387: asti subhūte rūpaṃ yad bodhisattvānāṃ prahīṇaṃ parijñātaṃ deśanāya vittatvāya saṃvartate |
K06n2882u_001:388: asti subhūte rūpaṃ yat prahīṇaṃ parijñātaṃ saṃdarśanavittatvāya saṃvartate |
K06n2882u_001:389: asti subhūte rūpaṃ yat prahīṇaṃ parijñātaṃ śukladharmasamanvayāya dharmavaśavartitvāya mahāsukhavihārāya saṃvartate ||
K06n2882u_001:396: asti subhūte vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad bodhisattvānāṃ prahīṇaṃ parijñātaṃ deśanāya vittatvāya saṃvartate |
K06n2882u_001:397: asti subhūte vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ
K06n2882u_001:405: asti subhūte vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad bodhisattvānāṃ prahīṇaṃ parijñātaṃ śukladharmasamanvayāya
K06n2882u_001:416: yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisattvo rūpe rūpamātraṃ duḥkhamātraṃ na samanupaśyati sa rūpa ātmānam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:417: yo rūpa ātmānam upalabhate sa rūpa ātmadṛṣṭim upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:418: yo rūpa ātmadṛṣṭim upalabhate sa rūpe sarvam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:419: yo rūpe sarvam upalabhate sa rūpe sarvaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:420: yo rūpe sarvam upalabhamānaḥ sarvaṃ nopalabhate sa tasya bha- (8)
K06n2882u_001:434: sa tam upalambhaṃ niśritya śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā tāvan na niryāti |
K06n2882u_001:442: yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisattvo vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne vijñānamātraṃ duḥkhamātraṃ na samanupaśyati sa vijñāna ātmānam upalabhate
K06n2882u_001:443: yo vijñāna ātmānam upalabhate sa vijñāna ātmadṛṣṭim upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:444: yo vijñāna ātmadṛṣṭim upalabhate sa vijñāne sarvam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:448: yo vijñāne sarvam upalabhate sa vijñāne sarvaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:449: yo vijñāne sarvam upalabhamānaḥ sarvaṃ nopalabhate sa tasya bhavaty upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:450: sa tam upalambhaṃ niśritya śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā tāvan na niryāti |
K06n2882u_001:458: yaḥ punaḥ subhūte rūpe rūpamātraṃ duḥkhamātraṃ samanupaśyati sa rūpa ātmānaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:464: yo rūpa ātmadṛṣṭiṃ nopalabhate sa rūpe sarvaṃ nopalabhate | yo rūpe
K06n2882u_001:468: sarvaṃ nopalabhate sa rūpe sarvaṃ upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:469: yo rūpe sarvam anupalabhamānaḥ sarvam upalabhate sa tasya bhavaty upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:474: śrā vakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā niryāti no tu
K06n2882u_001:491: yaḥ punaḥ subhūte vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne vijñānamātraṃ duḥkhamātraṃ samanupaśyati sa vijñāna ātmānaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:492: yo vijñāna ātmānaṃ nopalabhate sa vijñāna ātmadṛṣṭiṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:493: yo vijñāna ātmadṛṣṭiṃ nopalabhate sa vijñāne sarvaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:503: anupalabhamānaḥ sarvam upalabhate sa tasya bhavaty upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:508: vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā niryāti no tu mahāyānena ||
K06n2882u_001:519: na samanupaśyati sa rūpe rūpam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:530: yo rūpe sarvam upalabhate sa rūpe sarvaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:531: yo rūpe sarvam upalabhamānaḥ sarvaṃ nopalabhate sa tasya bhavaty upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:532: sa tam upalambhaṃ niśritya śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā tāvan na niryāti |
K06n2882u_001:540: yaḥ kaścit subhūte vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne (10)
K06n2882u_001:563: yo vijñāne vijñānadṛṣṭim upalabhate sa vijñāne sarvam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:564: yo vijñāne sarvam upalabhate sa vijñāne sarvaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:565: yo vijñāne sarvam upalabhamānaḥ sarvaṃ nopalabhate sa tasya bhavaty
K06n2882u_001:570: sa tam upalambhaṃ niśritya śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā tāvan na niryāti |
K06n2882u_001:578: yas tu subhūte rūpe'bhūtaparikalpamātraṃ bhrāntimātraṃ samanupaśyati sa rūpe rūpaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:584: yo rūpe rūpadṛṣṭiṃ nopalabhate sa rūpe sarvaṃ nopalabhate | yo rūpe
K06n2882u_001:588: sarvam nopalabhate sa rūpe sarvam upalabhate | yo rūpe
K06n2882u_001:592: sarvam anupalabhamānaḥ sarvam upalabhate sa tasya bhavaty
K06n2882u_001:597: sa tam upalambhaṃ niśritya mahāyānena tāvan niryāti |
K06n2882u_001:598: kaḥ punar vādaḥ śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā ||
K06n2882u_001:605: yas tu vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte
K06n2882u_001:628: yo vijñāne vijñānadṛṣṭiṃ nopalabhate sa vijñāne sarvaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:632: yo vijñāne sarvaṃ nopalabhate sa vijñāne sarvam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:633: yo vijñāne sarvam anupalabhamānaḥ sarvam upalabhate sa tasya bhavaty upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:634: sa tam upalambhaṃ niśritya mahāyānena tāvan niryāti |
K06n2882u_001:635: kaḥ punar vādaḥ śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā ||
K06n2882u_001:657: evaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvasya yathārutābhiniveśavyāhārasamudācāraḥ satkāyadṛṣṭisamudācāraḥ punarbhavatṛṣṇāsamudācāro vibhavaparyeṣṭisamudācāro vijñāne'parijñātaliṅgam ||
K06n2882u_001:679: evaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte
K06n2882u_001:708: trīṇīmāni subhūte rūpe bodhisattvasya cittabījāni yani pratyayagṛhītāni vyavadānāya saṃvartante |
K06n2882u_001:716: trīṇīmāni subhūte vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvasya cittabījāni yāni pratyayagṛhītāni
K06n2882u_001:732: trīṇīmāni subhūte rūpe bodhisattvena cittāny utpādayitavyāni |
K06n2882u_001:734: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaḥ tadrūpe cittotpādam (13)
K06n2882u_001:747: anutpādaṃ mahotpādaṃ samanupaśyati sa evaṃ samanupaśyan kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate ||
K06n2882u_001:754: trīṇīmāni subhūte vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne bodhisattvena cittāny utpādayitavyāni |
K06n2882u_001:760: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaḥ tadvijñāne cittotpādam anutpādaṃ mahotpādaṃ
K06n2882u_001:764: samanupaśyati sa evaṃ samanupaśyan kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate ||
K06n2882u_001:771: rūpaṃ sacet subhūte bodhisattvo'stitayā tathāstitayā nāstitayā
K06n2882u_001:775: vā samanupaśyaty atattvajño bodhisattva iti veditavyaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:782: evaṃ vedanāṃ samjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ sacet subhūte
K06n2882u_001:786: bodhisattvo'sti tayā tathāstitayā nāstitayā vā samanupaśyaty
K06n2882u_001:807: nāstitayā samanupaśyati tattvajño bodhisattva iti veditavyaḥ ||
K06n2882u_001:814: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ sacet subhūte bodhisattvo'nastitayātathāstitayānastinā stitayā samanupaśyati
K06n2882u_001:825: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvasya cittaṃ samādhātukāmasya rūpam
K06n2882u_001:829: adhimucyamānasya tac cittaṃ rūpa uccalati saṃcalati vicalati duradhimokṣo bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ ||
K06n2882u_001:836: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvasya cittaṃ samādhātukāmasya vijñānam adhimucyamānasya vijñāne tac cittam uccalati saṃcalati vicalati
K06n2882u_001:847: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvaś cittaṃ samādhātukāmas tac ca rūpam
K06n2882u_001:851: adhimucyamāno rūpe cittaṃ na badhnāti na saṃbadhnāti na vibadhnāti svadhimokṣo bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ ||
K06n2882u_001:862: bodhisattvaś cittaṃ samādhātukāmas tac ca vijñānam
K06n2882u_001:866: adhimucyamāno vijñāne cittaṃ na badhnāti na saṃbadhnāti na vibadhnāti svadhimokṣo bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ || (15)
K06n2882u_001:888: evaṃ ca samyakpratipanno bodhisattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate ||
K06n2882u_001:895: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte alakṣaṇadharmaparijñāyai duḥkhapraśamāya nirvāṇānaikāntikatvāya ca pratipanno bodhisattvaḥ samyakpratipanno veditavyaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:896: evaṃ ca samyakpratipanno bodhisattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate ||
K06n2882u_001:922: rūpe subhūte nirālokaṃ samantālokaṃ tadāśrayaṃ tatpraveśaṃ
K06n2882u_001:926: ca dharmaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānan bodhisattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate ||
K06n2882u_001:933: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte nirālokaṃ samantālokaṃ tadāśrayaṃ tatpraveśaṃ ca dharmaṃ (16)
K06n2882u_001:946: yathābhūtaṃ prajānan bodhisattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisambudhyate ||
K06n2882u_001:972: rūpe subhūte rūpaṃ parimārgamāṇo bodhisattvaḥ tac cānupalabhamāno rūpam anābhāsīkṛtya rūpadharmasamatāṃ ca prati vidhya kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate ||
K06n2882u_001:979: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte vijñānaṃ parimārgamāṇo bodhisattvaḥ tac cānupalabhamāno vijñānam anābhāsīkṛtya vijñānadharmasamatāṃ ca pratividhya kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate ||
K06n2882u_001:1005: rūpe subhūte abhāvakuśalo bodhisattvo rūpavibhavena samanvāgato rūpadharmadhātuniścalaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ
K06n2882u_001:1022: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte abhāvakuśalo bodhisattvo vijñānavibhavena samanvāgato
K06n2882u_001:1052: rūpe subhūte nirartham apārthaṃ mahārthaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānan bodhisattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ abhisaṃbudhyate ||
K06n2882u_001:1059: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte nirartham
K06n2882u_001:1063: apārthaṃ mahārthaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānan bodhisattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate ||
K06n2882u_001:1095: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena pañca rāgān parijñāya parivarjayitavyāḥ vitarkarāgaḥ pratarkarāgo vikalparāgo rāgo mahārāgaś ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1102: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena pañca rāgān parijñāya parivarjayitavyāḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1103: vitarkarāgaḥ pratarkarāgo vikalparāgo rāgo mahārāgaś ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1110: rūpe subhūte bodhisattva imān pañca rāgān parivarjayitvā
K06n2882u_001:1121: yo rūpe rūpopalambhaḥ sa eva rūpe rūpānupalambhaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1122: sa tena rūpopalambhānupalambhena sarvaprakāraṃ rūpam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai
K06n2882u_001:1133: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattva imān pañca rāgān parivarjayitvā vijñānasvabhāvaṃ
K06n2882u_001:1148: yo vijñāne vijñānopalambhaḥ sa eva vijñāne vijñānānupalambhaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1149: sa tena vijñāno palambhānupalambhena sarvaprakāraṃ vijñānam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye ||
K06n2882u_001:1156: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena pañca dveṣān parijñāya parivarjayitavyāḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1177: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne sūbhūte bodhisattvena pañca dveṣān parijñāya parivarjayitavyāḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1189: rūpe subhūte bodhisattva imān pañca dveṣān parivarjayitvā
K06n2882u_001:1199: rūpe rūpam anupalabhamāno rūpe rūpam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1205: sa tena rūpopalambhānupalambhena sarvaprakāraṃ rūpam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai
K06n2882u_001:1216: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattva imān pañca dveṣān parivarjayitvā vijñānasvabhāvaṃ
K06n2882u_001:1222: vijñāne vijñānam anupalabhamāno vijñāne vijñānam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1228: sa tena vijñānopalambhānupalambhena sarvaprakāraṃ vijñānam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye ||
K06n2882u_001:1235: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena pañca mohān parijñāya parivarjayitavyāḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1243: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bo- (20)
K06n2882u_001:1268: rūpe subhūte bodhisattva imān pañca mohān parivarjayitvā rūpasvabhāvaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1274: rūpe rūpam anupalabhamāno rūpe rūpam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1275: yo rūpe rūpopalambhaḥ sa eva rūpe rūpānupalambhaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1276: sa tena rūpopalambhānupalambhena sarvaprakāraṃ rūpam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye ||
K06n2882u_001:1283: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattva imān pañca mohān parivarjayitvā vijñānasvabhāvaṃ
K06n2882u_001:1289: vijñāne vijñānam anupalabhamāno vijñāne vijñānam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1295: sa tena vijñānopalambhānupalambhena sarvaprakāraṃ vijñānam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye ||
K06n2882u_001:1302: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena pañca mānān parijñāya parivarjayitavyāḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1310: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyaṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena pañca mānān parijñāya parivarjayitavyāḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1318: rūpe subhūte bodhisattva imān pañca mānān parivarjayitvā
K06n2882u_001:1351: sarvaprakāraṃ rūpam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai
K06n2882u_001:1362: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattva imān pañca mānān parivarjayitvā vijñānasvabhāvaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1364: vijñāne vijñānam anupalabhamāno vijñāne vijñānam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1370: sa tena vijñānopalambhānupalambhena sarvaprakāraṃ vijñānam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye ||
K06n2882u_001:1377: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena pañca dṛṣṭīḥ parijñāya parivarjayitavyāḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1378: svabhāvaviparyāsadṛṣṭir astītidṛṣṭir apavādadṛṣṭir dṛṣṭir mahādṛṣṭiś ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1385: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena pañca dṛṣṭīḥ parijñāya parivarjayitavyāḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1386: svabhāvaviparyāsadṛṣṭir astītidṛṣṭir apavādadṛṣṭir dṛṣṭir mahādṛṣṭiś ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1393: rūpe subhūte bodhisattva imāḥ pañca dṛṣṭīḥ parivarjayitvā
K06n2882u_001:1408: yo rūpe rūpopalambhaḥ sa eva rūpe rūpānupalambhaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1413: sarvaprakāraṃ rūpam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye ||
K06n2882u_001:1420: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhi- (22)
K06n2882u_001:1433: sattva imāḥ pañca dṛṣṭīḥ parivarjayitvā vijñānasvabhāvaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1435: vijñāne vijñānam anupalabhamāno vijñāne vijñānam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1436: yo vijñāne vijñānopalambhaḥ sa eva vijñāne vijñānānupalambhaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1437: sa tena vijñānopalambhānupalambhena sarvaprakāraṃ vijñānam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye ||
K06n2882u_001:1444: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena pañca vimatīḥ parijñāya parivarjayitavyāḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1448: dharmavimatir gatiduḥkhavimatir nirvāṇabuddhabodhisattvadharmavimatir vimatir mahāvimatiś ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1455: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
K06n2882u_001:1460: dharmavimatir gatiduḥkhavimatir nirvāṇabuddhabodhisattvadharmavimatir vimatir mahāvimatiś ca |
K06n2882u_001:1467: rūpe subhūte bodhisattva imāḥ pañca vimatīḥ parivarjayitvā rūpasvabhāvaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1469: rūpe rūpam anupalabhamāno rūpe rūpam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1470: yo rūpe rūpopalambhaḥ sa eva rūpe rūpānupalambhaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1471: sa tena rūpopalambhānupalambhena sarvaprakāraṃ rūpam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye ||
K06n2882u_001:1478: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattva imāḥ pañca vimatīḥ parivarjayitvā vijñānasvabhāvaṃ nopalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1493: vijñāne vijñānam anupalabhamāno vijñāne vijñānam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1494: yo vijñāne vijñānopalambhaḥ sa eva vijñāne vijñānānupalambhaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:1495: sa tena vijñānopalambhānupalambhena sarvaprakāraṃ vijñānam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye ||
K06n2882u_001:1502: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣan rūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayan rūpe kāyavāṅmanaskarma pariśodhayaṃs tad rūpaṃ yathārutaṃ yathādṛṣṭi yathākhyātaṃ paryeṣate dharmaṃ deśayati |
K06n2882u_001:1512: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣan rūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayan rūpe kāyavāṅmanaskarma pariśodhayaṃs tad rūpam ayathārutam ayathādṛṣṭi ayathākhyātaṃ paryeṣate dharmaṃ deśayati |
K06n2882u_001:1535: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣan vijñānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayan vijñāne kāyavāṅmanaskarma pariśodhayaṃs tad vijñānaṃ yathārutaṃ yathādṛṣṭi yathākhyātaṃ paryeṣate dharmaṃ deśayati |
K06n2882u_001:1545: vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣan vijñānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayan vijñāne kāyavāṅmaskarma pariśodhayaṃs tad vijñānam ayathārutam ayathādṛṣṭi ayathākhyātaṃ paryeṣate dharmaṃ deśayati |
K06n2882u_001:1572: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvaś cittaṃ samādhātukāmaḥ tac ca rūpam adhyātmam adhimucyamāno dvaye dvayam upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1574: tatra yo bodhisattvo rūpe yathādhimokṣyam adhimokṣam avavadate yathādhimokṣaṃ vādhimokṣyam avavadate rūpe'samyagavavaditā
K06n2882u_001:1604: adhimokṣarūpāt pṛthaglakṣaṇaṃ vidyate nānādhi muktānāṃ sattvānāṃ samādhimokṣye'bhinnāni darśanāny upalabhyeran |
K06n2882u_001:1613: na ca siddhe yukte nirvikalpādhimokṣe cādhimokṣyarūpam anuvarteta |
K06n2882u_001:1614: yasmāt tarhi subhūte nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ samādhimokṣye bhinnāni darśanāni pravartante |
K06n2882u_001:1622: na ca bālapṛthagjanā rūpe tattvadarśino bhavanti |
K06n2882u_001:1638: nānyatra sanimitadṛṣṭiko rūpādhimokṣas tathā yathā samutpannaṃ tad adhimokṣyarūpam |
K06n2882u_001:1647: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty adhimokṣyarūpe saty adhimokṣarūpaṃ yujyate nāsatīti viditvādhimokṣarūpabhrāntim upalabhate |
K06n2882u_001:1663: pūrvam eva cānena rūpabhrāntyabhrāntidharmāḥ samudānītā bhavanti |
K06n2882u_001:1664: sa rūpe'bhrāntidharmān abhrāntiniṣyandadharmāṃś ca niśritya sarvabuddhadharmān bhāvayati |
K06n2882u_001:1684: evaṃ rūpe'vavadamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samyagavavaditā bhavati ||
K06n2882u_001:1691: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvaś cittaṃ samādhātukāmaḥ tac ca vijñānam adhyātmam adhimucyamāno dvaye dvayam upalabhate
K06n2882u_001:1693: tatra yo bodhisattvo vijñāne yathādhimokṣyam adhimokṣam avavadate yathādhimokṣaṃ vādhimokṣyam avavadate vijñāne'samyagavavaditā bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ ||
K06n2882u_001:1701: na hi subhūte adhimokṣyavijñānam adhimokṣavijñānāt pṛthaglakṣaṇaṃ vidyate |
K06n2882u_001:1702: sacet subhūte adhimokṣyavijñānam adhimokṣavijñānāt pṛthaglakṣaṇaṃ vidyate nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ samādhimokṣye'bhinnāni darśanāny upalabhyeran
K06n2882u_001:1718: na ca siddhe yukte nirvikalpādhimokṣe cādhimokṣyavijñānam anuvarteta |
K06n2882u_001:1719: yasmāt tarhi subhūte nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ samādhimokṣye bhinnāni darśanāni pravartante |
K06n2882u_001:1721: na ca bālapṛthagjanā vijñāne tattvadarśino bhavanti |
K06n2882u_001:1728: nānyatra sanimittadṛṣṭiko vijñānādhimokṣas tathā yathā samutpannaṃ tad adhimokṣyavijñānam |
K06n2882u_001:1737: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty adhimokṣyavijñāne saty adhimokṣavijñānaṃ yujyate nāsatīti viditvādhimokṣavi- (30)
K06n2882u_001:1757: pūrvam eva cānena vijñānabhrāntyabhrāntidharmāḥ samudānītā bhavanti |
K06n2882u_001:1758: sa vijñāne'bhrāntidharmān abhrāntiniṣyandadharmāṃś ca niśritya sarvabuddhadharmān bhāvayati |
K06n2882u_001:1772: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārā maitrī bhāvayitavyā |
K06n2882u_001:1777: maitrī lokottarasukhopasaṃhārā maitrī maitrī mahāmaitrī ca || (31)
K06n2882u_001:1790: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
K06n2882u_001:1795: saddharmopasaṃhārā maitrī laukikasukhopasaṃhārā maitrī lokottarasukhopasaṃhārā maitrī maitrī mahāmaitrī ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1802: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārā karuṇā bhāvayitavyā |
K06n2882u_001:1803: asaṃgrahakaruṇā saṃyogakaruṇāpy asaṃyogakaruṇā karuṇā mahākaruṇā ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1810: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
K06n2882u_001:1815: asaṃgrahakaruṇā saṃyogakaruṇāpy asaṃyogakaruṇā karuṇā mahākaruṇā ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1822: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārā muditā bhāvayitavyā |
K06n2882u_001:1823: saddharmaprasādābhiṣyandanā nugrahānumodanā muditā laukikasukhābhiṣyandanānugrahānumodanā muditā lokottarasukhābhiṣyandanānugrahānumodanā muditā muditā mahāmuditā ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1830: vedanāyāṃ samjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
K06n2882u_001:1835: saddharmaprasādābhiṣyandanānugrahā numodanā muditā laukikasukhābhiṣyandanānugrahānumodanā muditā lokottarasukhābhiṣyandanānugrahānumodanā muditā muditā mahāmuditā
K06n2882u_001:1845: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcakāropekṣā bhāvayitavyā |
K06n2882u_001:1859: vedānāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
K06n2882u_001:1871: rūpe subhūte dānapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ dānaṃ bhāvayitavyam pratijñādānam āmiṣābhayapratipattidānaṃ dharmapratipattidānaṃ dānaṃ mahādānaṃ ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1878: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte dānapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ dānaṃ bhāvayitavyam |
K06n2882u_001:1890: rūpe subhūte śīlapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ śīlaṃ bhāvayitavyam |
K06n2882u_001:1891: samādānasāṃketikaśīlaṃ dhyānasaṃvaraśīlam anāsravasaṃvaraśīlaṃ śīlaṃ mahāśīlaṃ ca || (33)
K06n2882u_001:1904: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte śīlapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ śīlaṃ bhāvayitavyam |
K06n2882u_001:1905: samādānasāṃketikaśīlaṃ dhyānasaṃvaraśīlam anāsravasaṃvaraśīlaṃ śīlaṃ mahāśīlaṃ ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1917: sattvāpakāramarṣaṇā kṣāntir duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntir dharmanidhyānakṣāntiḥ kṣāntir mahākṣāntiś ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1924: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārā kṣāntir bhāvayitavyā |
K06n2882u_001:1925: sattvāpakāramarṣaṇā kṣāntir duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntir dharmanidhyānakṣāntiḥ kṣāntir mahākṣāntiś ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1932: rūpe subhūte vīryapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ vīryaṃ bhāvayitavyam |
K06n2882u_001:1933: uddeśasvādhyāyacittavīryaṃ sarvadoṣaparivarjanavīryaṃ sarvaguṇaparigrahavīryaṃ vīryaṃ mahāvīryaṃ ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1953: vīryapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ vīryaṃ bhāvayitavyam |
K06n2882u_001:1954: uddeśasvādhyāyacittavīryaṃ sarvadoṣaparivarjanavīryaṃ sarvaguṇaparigrahavīryaṃ vīryaṃ mahāvīryaṃ ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1961: rūpe subhūte dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ dhyānaṃ bhāvayitavyam |
K06n2882u_001:1969: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ dhyānaṃ bhāvayitavyam |
K06n2882u_001:1970: vyañjanasāpekṣa kuśaladhyānaṃ vyañjananirapekṣādiviśuddhalaukikakuśaladhyānaṃ lokottarakuśaladhyānaṃ dhyānaṃ mahādhyānaṃ ca ||
K06n2882u_001:1977: rūpe subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārā prajñā bhāvayitavyā |
K06n2882u_001:1978: vyañjanasāpekṣakuśaladhyānāśritā prajñā vyañjananirapekṣādiviśuddhalaukikadhyānāśritā prajñā lokottaradhyānāśritā prajñā prajñā mahāprajñā ca
K06n2882u_001:1991: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārā prajñā bhāvayitavyā |
K06n2882u_001:1992: vyañjanasāpekṣakuśaladhyānāśritā prajñā vyañjananirapekṣādiviśuddhalaukikadhyānāśritā prajñā lokottaradhyānāśritā prajñā prajñā mahāprajñā ca
K06n2882u_001:1999: rūpe subhūte kalyāṇamitrasevāprayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārayā kalyāṇamitrasevayā kalyāṇamitraṃ sevitavyam |
K06n2882u_001:2007: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte kalyāṇamitrasevāprayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārayā
K06n2882u_001:2019: evaṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ sevamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vimokṣopāyaṃ ca parigṛhṇāti |
K06n2882u_001:2034: rūpe subhūte tathāgatapūjāprayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārayā tathāgatapūjayā tathāgataḥ pūjayitavyaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:2035: vicitrastotropahārapūjayā lābhasatkāropasaṃhārapūjayā pratipattyārādhanapūjayā pūjayā mahāpūjayā ca ||
K06n2882u_001:2042: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte tathāgatapūjāprayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārayā tathāgatapūjayā tathāgataḥ pūjayitavyaḥ
K06n2882u_001:2054: evaṃ tathāgatapūjāyāṃ prayuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānantāparyanteṣu daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhabodhisattvā varṇaṃ bhāṣante |
K06n2882u_001:2065: rūpe subhūte dānapāramitāyāṃ prayukto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sanimittaṃ dānaṃ bhāvayan na kṣipraṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati |
K06n2882u_001:2066: animittaṃ tu dānaṃ bhāvayan kṣipraṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati |
K06n2882u_001:2080: bodhisattvo rūpe sanimittaṃ dānaṃ bhāvayaty animittaṃ vā |
K06n2882u_001:2081: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo rūpe dānam adhimucyamāno'dhimokṣyadānaṃ vopalabhate'dhimokṣadānaṃ vā sanimittaṃ bodhisattvo rūpe dānaṃ bhāvayatīti veditavyam |
K06n2882u_001:2082: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvo dānam adhimucyamāno nādhimokṣyadānam upalabhate nādhimokṣadānaṃ vā yad uta rūpasvabhāvānupalambhena tathābhāvānupalambhena prakṛtyanupalambhena rūpe'nimittaṃ bodhisattvo dānaṃ bhāvayatīti
K06n2882u_001:2093: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte dānapāramitāyāṃ prayukto bodhisattvaḥ sanimittaṃ dānaṃ bhāvayan
K06n2882u_001:2098: animittaṃ tu dānaṃ bhāvayan kṣipraṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati |
K06n2882u_001:2099: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo vijñāne sanimittaṃ dānaṃ bhāvayaty animittaṃ vā |
K06n2882u_001:2104: vijñāne dānam adhimucyamāno'dhimokṣyadānaṃ vopalabhate'dhimokṣadānaṃ vā sanimittaṃ dānaṃ bodhisattvo vijñāne bhāvayatīti veditavyam |
K06n2882u_001:2105: vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvo dānam adhimucyamāno nādhimokṣyadānam upalabhate nādhimokṣadānaṃ vā yad uta vijñānasvabhāvānupalambhena tathābhāvānupalambhena prakṛtyanupalambhena vijñāne'nimittaṃ bodhisattvo dānaṃ bhāvayatīti veditavyam || (38)
K06n2882u_001:2118: evaṃ śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyāṃ ca peyālaṃ kartavyam ||
K06n2882u_001:2127: yā subhūte rūpe'bhāva śūnyatāṃ tathābhāvaśūnyatāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ cālambanīkṛtya cittasyaikāgratāyaṃ rūpe śūnyatāsamādhiḥ |
K06n2882u_001:2128: evaṃ ca bodhisattvena rūpe śūnyatāsamādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ ||
K06n2882u_001:2135: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
K06n2882u_001:2145: yā subhūte vijñāne'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ tathābhāvaśūnyatāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ cālambanīkṛtya
K06n2882u_001:2163: yā subhūte bodhisattvasya rūpe'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ tathābhāvaśūnyatāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām evaṃ ca manasikurvato nirud- (39)
K06n2882u_001:2176: dhe nimitte'bhāvanimittānusārivijñānavirahitā tathābhāvanimittānusārivijñānavirahitā bhāvābhāvanimittānusārivijñānavirahitā cittasyaikāgratāyaṃ subhūte rūpe'nimittaḥ samādhiḥ |
K06n2882u_001:2177: evaṃ ca bodhisattvena rūpe'nimittaḥ samādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ ||
K06n2882u_001:2184: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvenānimittaḥ samādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ | katamaś ca
K06n2882u_001:2189: yā subhūte bodhisattvasya vijñāne'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ tathābhāvaśūnyatāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām
K06n2882u_001:2193: evaṃ ca manasikurvato niruddhe nimitte'bhāvanimittānusārivijñānavirahitā tathābhāvanimittānusārivijñānavirahitā bhāvābhāvanimittānusārivijñānavirahitā
K06n2882u_001:2198: evaṃ ca bodhisattvena vijñāne'nimittaḥ samādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ ||
K06n2882u_001:2220: nimittapratikūlālambanā tathābhāvanimittapratikūlālambanā bhāvābhāvanimittapratikūlālambanā cittasyaikāgratāyaṃ subhūte rūpe'praṇihitasamādhiḥ
K06n2882u_001:2221: evaṃ ca bodhisattvena rūpe'praṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ ||
K06n2882u_001:2228: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvenāpraṇihitasamādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ |
K06n2882u_001:2252: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena tribhir arthair anityatā parijñeyā |
K06n2882u_001:2260: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
K06n2882u_001:2272: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena tribhir arthair duḥkhatā parijñeyā |
K06n2882u_001:2280: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
K06n2882u_001:2292: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena tribhir arthair anātmatā parijñeyā |
K06n2882u_001:2300: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhi- (42)
K06n2882u_001:2321: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena tribhir arthair nirvāṇaśāntatā
K06n2882u_001:2337: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
K06n2882u_001:2353: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanāḥ sthavirasubhūtis tāś ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti ||
